name: Ithos

skills.name: Gouge
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of granting an Extra Turn. Decreases enemy MAX HP by 15% of damage dealt.

effects.notes: Single-hit. 3.8x ATK multiplier (4.9 ATK fully booked with +30% damage).
Decreases enemy MAX HP by 15% of damage dealt. Permanent reduction (not a debuff, cannot be cleansed). Excellent for reducing boss/tanky enemy HP pools.
20% chance to grant Extra Turn (no booking). Can chain into A2/A3 for massive burst damage.

skills.book_value: Medium: +30% damage (3.8→4.9 ATK). No Extra Turn chance increase. Good for A1 filler damage.
skills.notes: Single-hit A1 with MAX HP reduction (permanent, 15% of damage dealt). 20% Extra Turn chance can chain into A2/A3 for burst. Excellent for boss HP reduction.

skills.name: Outburst
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: AoE 3-hit. 1.35x ATK per hit = 4.05 ATK total base (5.27 ATK fully booked with +30% damage). Triggers Giant Slayer 3x per cast for massive T6 mastery damage.
100% chance to place 25% Weaken on all enemies (no ACC check per Ayumilove - always lands). Increases team damage by 25%.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +30% damage, -1 cooldown (4→3). Must book for wave clear and Giant Slayer procs.
skills.notes: AoE 3-hit for Giant Slayer procs + Weaken. Total: 4.05 ATK base (5.27 booked). Weaken always lands (no ACC check). Must book for 3-turn cooldown wave clearing.

skills.name: Extinguish Life
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. This attack is always critical.

effects.notes: AoE nuke. 4.4x ATK multiplier (5.72 ATK fully booked with +30% damage). ALWAYS CRITS (ignores C.RATE stat, guaranteed critical hit). Build 350%+ C.DMG for max damage. ICONIC Arena/Dungeon wave nuke.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +30% damage, -2 cooldown (6→4). MUST BOOK for Arena/Dungeon viability. Reduces cooldown from 6 to 4 turns.
skills.notes: PRIMARY NUKE: 4.4 ATK AoE (5.72 booked) + ALWAYS CRITS. Ignores C.RATE stat (no C.RATE needed), build 350%+ C.DMG for max damage. MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. ICONIC Arena/Dungeon wave clear nuke. Pair with Dec DEF for max damage.

skills.name: Silent Death [P]
skills.description: Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 25% whenever an enemy is killed by this Champion.

effects.notes: +25% TM per kill. Excellent for chaining turns in Arena/Dungeons. If Ithos kills 4 enemies with A3, gains 100% TM for instant next turn. Synergizes with Extra Turn on A1 for cycling nukes.

skills.notes: TM boost passive on kill. +25% TM per kill = potential instant turn after A3 wipe (4 kills = 100% TM). Excellent for Arena speed chaining and Dungeon wave clear cycling.

forms.aura: Increases Ally C.RATE in the Arena by 33%.
forms.comments: GLASS CANNON AoE nuker. A3 'Extinguish Life' ALWAYS CRITS (build 350%+ C.DMG, 0% C.RATE viable). A2 3-hit Giant Slayer procs + Weaken. Passive TM boost on kill for turn cycling. ICONIC Arena/Dungeon champion. Void affinity = no weak hits. Must book A2/A3 for cooldown reduction. CRITICAL: 716 DEF = extreme glass cannon, requires protection or one-shot strategy.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 200+ SPD, 100% C.RATE (A1/A2), 250%+ C.DMG, 150+ ACC for Weaken. Not optimal for CB (4/10).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 0% C.RATE (A3 always crits, C.RATE WASTED STAT), 350%+ C.DMG (CRITICAL for A3 nuke damage), 4500+ ATK (glass cannon max ATK build), 200+ SPD (speed tuning for wave clear), 150+ ACC (Weaken debuff). Savage or Cruel sets for ignore DEF nuking. MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 3-turn A2, 4-turn A3 cooldowns.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: PRIORITY: 0% C.RATE, 350%+ C.DMG, 4500+ ATK, 250+ SPD (speed nuke or follow Dec DEF), 150+ ACC (Weaken). +33% C.RATE Arena aura excellent for team. Pair with Dec DEF for max damage. One-shot or get one-shot (716 DEF glass cannon).
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 0% C.RATE, 350%+ C.DMG, 4500+ ATK, 200+ SPD, 150+ ACC (Weaken for boss waves). Savage or Cruel sets. Must book A2/A3. Excellent wave clear + boss damage (9/10 FW).

recommended_gear: Savage (BEST - ignore DEF for A3 nuke)
Cruel (ignore DEF + free C.RATE for A1/A2)
Speed (200+ SPD for wave clear cycling)

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Ruthless Ambush, GIANT SLAYER (A2 3-hit multi-hit triggers 3x per cast for MASSIVE T6 damage)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (CRITICAL - 716 DEF glass cannon needs damage reduction)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for Weaken), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Ruthless Ambush, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A2 3-hit triggers 3x per cast = massive wave clear damage, synergizes with A3 always-crit nuke)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (716 DEF glass cannon, needs damage reduction)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for Weaken), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Ruthless Ambush, GIANT SLAYER (A2 3-hit backup), CYCLE OF VIOLENCE (cooldown reduction on kill for chaining A3 nukes)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (glass cannon protection)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Ruthless Ambush, GIANT SLAYER (A2 3-hit wave clear + A3 nuke)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof (CRITICAL - 716 DEF glass cannon), Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for Weaken), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2/A3 cycling)
masteries.general: GIANT SLAYER CRITICAL (A2 3-hit AoE triggers 3x per cast for MASSIVE T6 damage on waves + bosses, synergizes with A3 always-crit nuke). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for Weaken uptime). Blastproof CRITICAL (716 DEF = extreme glass cannon, needs damage reduction). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for cooldown reduction (A2 4→3, A3 6→4). Build: 0% C.RATE (A3 always crits, C.RATE WASTED STAT), 350%+ C.DMG, 4500+ ATK, 200+ SPD, 150+ ACC. Savage sets for ignore DEF nuking. Focus: Arena (9/10) + Dungeons (9/10) + Faction Wars (9/10). User Priority: Doom Tower + Advanced PVE (Priority 3) - Ithos is ICONIC AoE wave clear champion for all content. Void affinity = no weak hits = excellent universal nuker.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)
Soul Reap (BEST - cooldown reduction on kill for Arena/Dungeons wave chaining)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 nuke when available, A2 for multi-hit wave clear. A1 Extra Turn chance can chain into A2/A3 for burst. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. ICONIC glass cannon AoE nuker for Arena/Dungeons/Faction Wars.

mechanics_advisory: GLASS CANNON AoE nuker (716 DEF = extreme fragility). A3 'Extinguish Life' is PRIMARY NUKE: 4.4 ATK AoE (5.72 booked) + ALWAYS CRITS (ignores C.RATE stat, build 0% C.RATE + 350%+ C.DMG for max damage). A2 'Outburst' is 3-hit AoE for Giant Slayer procs (triggers 3x per cast for MASSIVE T6 damage) + Weaken (always lands, no ACC check). A1 'Gouge' has 20% Extra Turn chance + MAX HP reduction (15% of damage dealt, permanent). Passive 'Silent Death' gives +25% TM per kill for turn cycling (4 kills = 100% TM instant turn). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for cooldown reduction (A2 4→3, A3 6→4). ICONIC for Arena/Dungeons/Faction Wars (9/10 all content). Void affinity = no weak hits = universal nuker. +33% C.RATE Arena aura excellent for team. Build: 0% C.RATE (A3 always crits, C.RATE WASTED STAT), 350%+ C.DMG, 4500+ ATK, 200+ SPD, 150+ ACC (Weaken). Savage sets for ignore DEF nuking. Giant Slayer CRITICAL for A2 3-hit wave clear. Cycle of Magic CRITICAL for faster A2/A3 cycling. CRITICAL WARNING: 716 DEF = extreme glass cannon, requires protection or one-shot strategy (kill everything before enemy turns). Pair with Dec DEF for max damage. User Priority: Advanced PVE (Priority 3) - Ithos is BEST AoE wave clear champion for Doom Tower, dungeons, and Faction Wars. Void affinity makes him safe in all content.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: ICONIC glass cannon AoE nuker. A3 always crits (0% C.RATE build viable). A2 3-hit Giant Slayer. Passive TM boost on kill. Void affinity universal. Must book A2/A3. User priority: Advanced PVE wave clear specialist.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Arena/Dungeons/Faction Wars focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades/RaidWiki.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from RaidWiki + Ayumilove OCR (8/8 stats 100% match: HP/ATK/DEF/SPD/C.RATE/C.DMG/RES/ACC validated)
